```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(plotly)

mpg %>% 
  kable() %>% 
  kable_classic(lightable_options = 'hover') %>% 
  scroll_box(width="500px", height= "200px")

# Well worth learning for table stuff!

p <- mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=displ,y=cty)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()

ggplotly(p)
```
